query:
SELECT 
  m.*,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM concorrentes WHERE mercadoId = m.id) as qtd_concorrentes,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM leads WHERE mercadoId = m.id) as qtd_leads
FROM mercados_unicos m
WHERE m.projectId = 330001

  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM leads WHERE mercadoId = m.id) as qtd_leads
